name: Revenge
debriefing: Excellent! You have conquered the mission! ~~Remember that if you search the area carefully, you may find additional lives or coins. ~~If you see allied objects on the map, you can apply the repairs to them also! Repair the allied tanks, and they will reciprocate.
briefing: Finally, everything is honest! The enemy's tanks have no cover! And you have the real chance to strip them up. ~~Hint: Stock up shells for various types of weapons, for the enemy, like cockroaches, will crawl from all cracks, and your way to the base may be not that easy.
